inclusion.criterion: Presence of advanced fibrosis or cirrhosis (stage F≥3 METAVIR) based on liver stiffness by transient elastography (≥ 9,5 kPa) or liver biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Gastrointestinal endoscopy at least 24 months before start of direct-acting agents for HCV treatment
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Liver stiffness measurement at least 18 months after SVR
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Autoimmune hepatitis, hepatosplenic schistosomiasis or cholestasis diseases
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of high volume ascites or hepatocellular carcinoma
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Participation in programs of esophageal band ligation for eradication of esophageal varices
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has HCV cirrhosis, grade II esophageal varices, and recent admission for UGIB. He also describes new imbalance leading to a fall.
